name: Green: Fire-Roasted Chile Sauce
description:
Green: Fire-Roasted Chile Sauce brings with in an authentic taste of Mexico. It has the perfect combination of fresh fire-roasted chile spice and zest.  Made from tomatillos, four different chiles, onions, spices, simmered for hours and finished with fresh lime juice and fresh cilantro.

Easy. Heat and Serve. Simmer over your favorite protein. Use as a braise, sauce, slather, condiment or secret 007 ingredient to spice up any meal. Scan label for ongoing recipe inspirations.

100% Natural. Gluten free. Approximately 5 portions per container. Net Weight 15 oz (525 g).

Handmade and packaged with care by Bunches & Bunches Ltd. in Portland, OR.

name: Smoked: Oaxacan Mole Sauce
description:
This mole sauce is for any occasion or time you want to spice up your life. Bunches & Bunches Ltd. - Provisions Smoked: Oaxacan Mole Sauce will transport you to the heart of Oaxaca. Made with smoked chiles imported from Oaxaca as well as a perfect combination of other chiles, tomatoes, onions, garlic, spices, simmered for hours and finished with lime and cilantro.

Easy. Heat and Serve. Simmer over your favorite protein. Use as a braise, sauce, slather, condiment or secret 007 ingredient to spice up any meal. Scan label for ongoing recipe inspirations.

100% Natural. Gluten free. Vegetarian. Approximately 5 portions per container. Net Weight 15 oz (525 g).

Handmade and packaged with care by Bunches & Bunches Ltd. in Portland, OR.

name: Red: Dried Chilaca Mole Sauce
description:
Red: Dried Chilaca Mole Sauce from Bunches & Bunches Ltd. - Provisions will spice up any meal. This mole is made from a blend of chiles, tomatoes, onions, garlic, pumpkin seeds, almonds, raisins, chocolate, spices, simmered for hours and then finished with lime and a generous amount of fresh cilantro, ground into a spicy, subtly sweet, ultra-rich red chile sauce.

Easy. Heat and Serve. Simmer over your favorite protein. Use as a braise, sauce, slather, condiment or secret 007 ingredient to spice up any meal. Scan label for ongoing recipe inspirations. 

100% Natural. Gluten free. Approximately 5 portions per container. Net Weight 15 oz (525 g).

Handmade and packaged with care by Bunches & Bunches Ltd. in Portland, OR.

name: Mole Trifecta
description:
Bunches & Bunches – Provisions are essential pantry items for every kitchen.  Bunches & Bunches – Provisions is proud to introduce it’s trio of mole sauces {Red, Smoked and Green}, inspired by Mark’ passion for the vast and bright flavors of real Mexican cuisine. Mark’s hand crafted, small batch, authentic moles will only add to the reputation Bunches and Bunches Ltd. has already established as a simple and elegant brand of the utmost quality. 

Whether you are in the mood for a rich Red Mole, the dark smoky flavor of the Smoked Mole or the bright fresh zip of the Green Mole. Bunches & Bunches – Provisions Moles will transport your palate to the heart of real Mexico any time you like. They will blow you away by their incredible richness and deep flavors. They make a marvelously impressive meal easy to prepare in minutes. You can feel good knowing that each batch, as with all of Bunches & Bunches products, was made with bunches and bunches of love.

Easy. Heat and Serve. Simmer over your favorite protein. Use as a braise, sauce, slather, condiment or secret 007 ingredient to spice up any meal. Scan label for ongoing recipe inspirations.

100% Natural. Gluten free. Approximately 5 portions per container. Net Weight 15 oz (525 g).

Handmade and packaged with care by Bunches & Bunches Ltd. in Portland, OR.

name: Cloud Cookies
description:
Love is the most precious ingredient in my pantry.  Every batch of my Cloud Cookies - a perfect blend of crisp meringue and chewy macaroon - is full of bunches and bunches of love.  The combination of flavor and texture of these cookies is irresistible. Once you bite into my sweet cumulus concoctions you'll never imagine clouds the same way again. 

100% Natural. Gluten free. Approximately 16 cookies per container. Net Weight 12 oz (340 g).

Handmade and packaged with care by Bunches & Bunches Ltd. in Portland, OR.

name: Bailey's Dog Biscuits
description:
Bailey's Biscuits are an ode to my first big dog love, Bailey. They are a delicious healthy snack or treat for dogs of all ages. Bailey, Jackomino & Daisy (our dogs) love these treats. They want to share the yum with your dog too. 

100% Natural. Handmade. No Preservatives. 

Ingredients we're proud of: whole wheat flour, cracked wheat, chicken broth, all-purpose flour, wheat germ, corn meal, powdered dry milk, water, egg, butter, honey, yeast & lots of love.  

Net Weight 2.2 Lbs. (963 G). 

Handmade and packaged with care by Bunches & Bunches Ltd. in Portland, OR.

name: Snaps - Ginger Cookies
description:
Every batch of my Snaps - a ginger cookie for those who enjoy the spice of life - is full of bunches and bunches of love. These scrumptious ginger crisps have the perfect combination of sugar, spice and snap. I hope you will be delighted by my sassy version of this classic cookie. May you fall madly in love at first bite. Snap!

Small-batch ginger cookies, 100%natural, no preservatives. Handmade and packaged with care by Bunches & Bunches Ltd. in Portland, OR.

Approx. 24 ginger cookies per container. Net Wt. 8 oz (23g).

name: Linen Bib Apron from Bunches & Bunches - Provisions
description:
Our bib apron is functional in the kitchen and, should you forget to leave it behind, beautiful at your table. The natural linen is perfect for all cooks, messy or neat. Easy to wash-and-wear, it will soon become one of your kitchen essentials.

A cross-back flatters all figures, while the roomy pockets add function to form and generous ties keep the apron snug.

Machine washable (cool to warm water and a mild soap recommended). Hang dry and skip the starch in order to keep the natural look and feel of the linen (or machine dry on low).

Linen and 100% cotton twill
One size fits all
43"L, 32"W

Hand cut and sewn with love in Portland, Oregon.

name: 100% Cotton Flour Sack Towels from Bunches & Bunches - Provisions
description:
Our old-fashioned flour sack towels are soon to become one of your kitchen essentials. Towels cut from cotton flour sacks were once used for all kinds of household tasks – from drying dishes and polishing glassware to straining foods and covering rising dough. 

These towels are super-absorbent, extra soft, and lint free. You will find endless uses for them. They are a life-saver in this messy world! 

100% Cotton. Machine wash and tumble dry.

Set of three 38”L, 26”W towels 

Hand cut and sewn with love in Portland, Oregon.
